entry.title: Premoro - Beef Pizza Topping - 2.27 Kg
entry.summary:
Vendor: Premoro
Type: FOOD
Price: 36.99 - 69.99 (2 variants)

Premoro - Beef Sausage Pizza Topping - 2.27 Kg

Our traditional and specialty beef toppings are well-suited for a variety of applications and dayparts, providing you tremendous versatility. Add an extra savory touch to your favorite pizzas, or explore tacos, bowls, sandwiches and more. With limitless possibilities, you’ll push the limits of your creativity.

  • Proprietary cooking process utilizing impingement ovens, which sharpens flavors and prevents the off flavors sometimes associated with fluid cooking
  • Produced with fresh, rather than frozen meat for exceptional flavor
  • Exclusive, natural antioxidant blend extends the product life to give you the most for your investment while you please your customer
  • Individually Quick Frozen (IQF), our toppings can be used right from the freezer

OUR HUGE VARIETY GIVES YOU FLEXIBILITY

  • Flavor – Grill to Italian and mild to spicy
  • Size – 4/oz to fine crumble
  • Shape – Crumble to uniformly round or oblong to the randomly craggy look 
  • Extension – All meat to high extension
  • Pack size – 5-lb bags to bulk packaging

entry.title: Soloway's - Jalapeno Sausage 8"- 12 Pcs
entry.summary:
Vendor: Soloway's
Type: FOOD
Price: 19.99

Soloway's - Jalapeno Sausage 8"- 12 Pcs

A Range Of Mouthwatering Wieners And Sausages

We provide premium quality sausages at a price that gives you value for your money. When you buy from us, you get the promise of unmatchable taste and quality. Please go through the menu below to choose your favourite style of wieners and sausages.

Our sausages and wieners can help you put together a juicy and succulent meal within minutes. Easy to prepare and delightful to eat, our sausages are flavourful and wholesome. You can make delicious hot dogs with our classic or specialty sausages. You can also add our breakfast sausages to your eggs and add some cheer to the breakfast table. Loved by kids and adults alike, our sausages are the perfect blend of good quality and great taste. Whether you’re roasting them on a grill on a sunny day, or just frying them up with some sautéed onions, our sausages are sure to leave you with a full belly and a smiling face.

Over the years, Soloway's Hot Dog Factory has served clients across Great Toronto Area. Our dedication to providing complete customer satisfaction to our clients has helped us consolidate our place as a trusted supplier. Our broad base of clients is a resounding testimony to the quality of our products.

entry.title: Schneiders - Juicy Jumbo All Beef Wieners - 375g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Schneiders
Type: FOOD
Price: 7.99

Schneiders - Juicy Jumbos 100% All Beef - 375g

The trick behind making these wieners so “juicy” is the coarser grind we use for the premium cuts of beef inside. It retains moisture better. Because the beef is so bold, we add extra amounts of our signature spice blend – featuring nutmeg, paprika, coriander, garlic, and pimento – to make the flavours just sing together.

Also available in a larger 750g party pack.

Schneiders® Juicy Jumbos® All Beef Wieners are a delicious take on an iconic classic. These juicy hot dogs are crafted with our premium cuts of beef and a mix of signature spices for a perfect harmony of flavours. The result is a tasty and versatile beef hot dog that pairs perfectly with classic condiments. Since 1890, Schneiders® brand has established a rich heritage of original and authentic recipes, using premium ingredients and taking all the time needed to honour the origin and inspiration of each recipe. Quality never gets old.™
EXTRA JUICY WIENERS: Made with juicy ground beef
MILDLY SPICED: A signature blend of spices complements the all beef hot dog
GREAT FOR ANY COOKOUT: Versatile flavour of these wieners pairs perfectly with classic condiments
PREMIUM CUTS: Schneiders® brand hot dogs are crafted using only our quality cuts of meat
QUALITY NEVER GETS OLD™: Uncompromising commitment to quality since 1890

entry.title: Cardinal - Mini Beef Burgers - 48 x 45G
entry.summary:
Vendor: Cardinal
Type: FOOD
Price: 32.99

Cardinal - Mini Beef Burgers - 48 x 45G - 2.18 Kg

Small in Size. Big on Menu Impact.

Great for appetizers, kids menu, or just something different at lunch! Made with Cardinal's premium beef and spices for a perfectly small-eating delight.

  • Good coverage on standard mini hamburger bun
  • Consistent size, shape, and portion control
  • Serve in 2, 3, 4 burger combos, or fun party platter
  • Cardinal food safety, takes the worry out of making your own

Satisfy even the most avid meat-lovers with rich and juicy Beef burgers. These burgers are known for the  well balanced ratio of fat and muscle. This ensures that every bite of every patty is consistently tender. This quality meat makes for juicy, mouthwatering burgers with an unforgettable sizzle, heat, and robust flavor. They pair perfectly with crisp greens or melted cheese on a grainy roll or smooth and soft bun. Plus, the natural shape of each burger adds the perfect, trendy touch to any menu.

Add new and delicious flavors to your menu with these burgers. These burgers are made ideal for making juicy, flavorful burgers cooked rare or medium rare and avoids extra, un-rendered fat in the cooked burgers.

Able to be cooked on a charcoal grill, flat top grill, stove-top, or in an oven, these burgers will bring a versatile addition to your restaurant. The size of these patties is ideal for making samplers, appetizers, or sliders for your customers. Keep these burgers on hand to make sandwiches full of rich, savory flavors.
